title: Slight delay from HBF to BNV due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于火车故障，HBF至BNV轻微延误
title_translations.ms: Kelewatan sedikit dari HBF ke BNV kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக HBF இலிருந்து BNV வரை தாமதம்

updates.text: Normal service from HBF to BNV has resumed. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Expect slight delay from HBF to BNV due to a train fault.
